short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect with friends on a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connect with friends on a single click

If you don't have enough time to send friend request manually, then this is the right extension to use. Add your keywords and click a button! BOOM!! All done for you automatically.


Introduced some newly user authentication module and security fixes.
- Login with Password
- Forgot Password
- Change password
- Increased security
- Minor bug fixes
